circaDateCreated.title: Circa Date Created
circaDateCreated.description: Approximate date or range of dates associated with the creation and production of an artwork or object or its components.

contentDescription.title: Content Description
contentDescription.description: A textual description of the content depicted in the artwork or object.

contributionDescription.title: Contribution Description
contributionDescription.description: A textual description about a contribution made to an artwork or an object.

copyrightNotice.title: Copyright Notice
copyrightNotice.description: Contains any necessary copyright notice for claiming the intellectual property for artwork or an object in the image and should identify the current owner of the copyright of this  work with associated intellectual property rights.

creatorNames.title: Creator
creatorNames.description: Contains the name of the artist who has created artwork or an object in the  image. In cases where the artist could or should not be identified the name of a company or organisation may be appropriate.

creatorIdentifiers.title: Creator ID
creatorIdentifiers.description: Globally unique identifier for the creator of artwork or object.

currentCopyrightOwnerIdentifier.title: Current Copyright Owner ID
currentCopyrightOwnerIdentifier.description: Globally unique identifier for the current owner of the copyright of the artwork or object.

currentCopyrightOwnerName.title: Current Copyright Owner Name
currentCopyrightOwnerName.description: Name of the current owner of the copyright of the artwork or object.

currentLicensorIdentifier.title: Current Licensor ID
currentLicensorIdentifier.description: Globally unique identifier for the current licensor of the artwork or object.

currentLicensorName.title: Current Licensor Name
currentLicensorName.description: Name of the current licensor of the artwork or object.

dateCreated.title: Date Created
dateCreated.description: Designates the date and optionally the time the artwork or object in the image was created. This relates to artwork or objects with associated intellectual property rights.

physicalDescription.title: Physical Description
physicalDescription.description: A textual description of the physical characteristics of the artwork or object, without reference to the content depicted.

source.title: Source
source.description: The organisation or body holding and registering the artwork or object in the image for inventory purposes.

sourceInventoryNr.title: Source Inventory Number
sourceInventoryNr.description: The inventory number issued by the organisation or body holding and registering the artwork or object in the image.

sourceInventoryUrl.title: Source Inventory URL
sourceInventoryUrl.description: URL reference to the metadata record of the inventory maintained by the Source.

stylePeriod.title: Style Period
stylePeriod.description: The style, historical or artistic period, movement, group, or school whose characteristics are represented in the artwork or object.

title.title: Title
title.description: A reference for the artwork or object in the image.

identifiers.title: Identifier
identifiers.description: Globally unique identifier of the concept

identifiers.title: Identifier
identifiers.description: Globally unique identifier of the concept

role.title: Role
role.description: Identifier of the role the concept has in the context of the metadata property

cvId.title: CV-Term CV ID
cvId.description: Globally unique identifier of the Controlled Vocabulary the term is from.

cvTermId.title: CV-Term ID
cvTermId.description: Globally unique identifier of the term from a Controlled Vocabulary.

cvTermName.title: CV-Term name
cvTermName.description: Natural language name of the term from a Controlled Vocabulary.

cvTermRefinedAbout.title: Refined 'aboutness' of the CV-Term
cvTermRefinedAbout.description: Refinement of the 'about' relationship of the term with the content.

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Name of the manufacturer of the device

attLensDescription.title: Attached Lens Description
attLensDescription.description: Short description of the lens used with the device at the time of the recording

ownerDeviceId.title: Owner´s Device ID
ownerDeviceId.description: Identifier assigned by the owner of the device

rightsExprLangId.title: Rights Expression Language ID
rightsExprLangId.description: Identifier of the rights expression language used by the rights expression.

rightsExprEncType.title: Encoding type
rightsExprEncType.description: Encoding type of the rights expression, identified by an IANA Media Type.

encRightsExpr.title: Encoded Rights Expression
encRightsExpr.description: Embedded serialized rights expression using a rights expression language which is encoded as a string.

identifiers.title: Identifier
identifiers.description: Globally unique identifier of the entity

identifiers.title: Identifier
identifiers.description: Globally unique identifier of the entity

role.title: Role
role.description: Identifier of the role the entity has in the context of the metadata property

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the episode or season of a series

number.title: Number
number.description: Number of the episode or season of a series

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Identifier of the episode or season of a series

widthPixels.title: Width
widthPixels.description: Width of the video frame in pixels

heightPixels.title: Height
heightPixels.description: Height of the video frame in pixels

unitPixels.title: Measure Unit
unitPixels.description: Units of width and height values, fixed value "pixels"

rightsExprLangId.title: Rights Expression Language ID
rightsExprLangId.description: Identifier of the rights expression language used by the rights expression.

rightsExprEncType.title: Encoding type
rightsExprEncType.description: Encoding type of the rights expression, identified by an IANA Media Type.

linkedRightsExpr.title: Link to Encoded Rights Expression
linkedRightsExpr.description: Link to a rights expression using a rights expression language.

link.title: Image Link
link.description: Link URL locating the image resource

linkQualifiers.title: Image Qualifier
linkQualifiers.description: Qualifier of the relationship of the image with the video

role.title: Image Role
role.description: Role of this image in the context of the video

widthPixels.title: Image Width
widthPixels.description: Width of the image, in pixels

heightPixels.title: Image Height
heightPixels.description: Height of the image, in pixels

usedVideoFrame.title: Used Video Frame
usedVideoFrame.description: Frame of the video used for this still image.

identifiers.title: Identifier
identifiers.description: Globally unique identifier of the location

sublocation.title: Sublocation name
sublocation.description: Name of a sub location the Location is located in

city.title: City name
city.description: Name of the city the Location is located in

provinceState.title: State/Province name
provinceState.description: Name of the state or province the Location is located in

countryName.title: Country name
countryName.description: Name of the country the Location is located in

countryCode.title: Country ISO code
countryCode.description: ISO code of the country the Location is located in

worldRegion.title: World region name
worldRegion.description: Name of the world region the Location is located in

gpsLongitude.title: GPS-Longitude
gpsLongitude.description: Longitude of a WGS84 based position of this Location

gpsLatitude.title: GPS-Latitude
gpsLatitude.description: Latitude of a WGS84 based position of this Location

gpsAltitude.title: GPS-Altitude
gpsAltitude.description: Altitude in meters of a WGS84 based position of this Location

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Globally unique identifier of the entity

identifiers.title: Identifier
identifiers.description: Globally unique identifier of the person

description.title: Description
description.description: A textual description of the person

characteristics.title: Characteristics
characteristics.description: A property or trait of the person

gtin.title: GTIN
gtin.description: A 14 digit GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) of the product (GTIN-8 to GTIN-14 codes are used).

description.title: Description
description.description: A textual description of the product.

date.title: Publication Date
date.description: Date and optionally the time of publishing the video

name.title: Publication Event Name
name.description: Name of the event for publishing this video.

identifier.title: Publication Event Identifier
identifier.description: Identifier of the event for publishing this video

linkQualifier.title: Qualifier
linkQualifier.description: Term qualifying the use of the link

linkQualifier.title: Qualifier
linkQualifier.description: Term qualifying the use of the link

linkLanguage.title: Language
linkLanguage.description: Language of the content at the link location

ratingValue.title: Rating Value
ratingValue.description: Rating value as issued by the rating source

ratingSourceLink.title: Rating Source Link
ratingSourceLink.description: Link to the site and optionally the page of the party which has issued the rating value, linked resource should explain the rating rules.

ratingScaleMinValue.title: Rating Scale Min Value
ratingScaleMinValue.description: The value of the rating scale used for the lowest/worst rating

ratingScaleMaxValue.title: Rating Scale Max Value
ratingScaleMaxValue.description: The value of the rating scale used for the highest/best rating

ratingValueLogoLink.title: Rating Value Logo
ratingValueLogoLink.description: Visualisation of the rating value referenced by a link

ratingRegions.title: Rating Region
ratingRegions.description: Geopolitical region to which this rating applies.

assetIdentifier.title: Asset Identifier
assetIdentifier.description: Unique identifier of the video as issued by a registry

registryIdentifier.title: Registry Identifier
registryIdentifier.description: An identifier for the registry which issued the identifier of the video.

role.title: Role
role.description: An identifier of the reason and/or purpose for this Registry Entry.

tempCoverageFrom.title: From Date
tempCoverageFrom.description: Optionally truncated date when the temporal coverage starts

tempCoverageTo.title: To Date
tempCoverageTo.description: Optionally truncated date when the temporal coverage ends

measureType.title: Measure Type
measureType.description: How the measures of the rectangle are expressed

regionAreaX.title: Rectangle, upper left X
regionAreaX.description: Horizontal axis value of the upper left corner of the rectange

regionAreaY.title: Rectangle, upper left Y
regionAreaY.description: Vertical axis value of the upper left corner of the rectange

timeFormat.title: Time Format
timeFormat.description: Identifier of the time format. For time code formats following SMPTE specifications.

timeValue.title: Time Value
timeValue.description: Formated string including hours, minutes, seconds, fractions of seconds or frames, depending on the Time Format
